name: Horror MathGame!
description:
Guys, I'm want to make it clear that this file IS NOT A VIRUS, it's just a mistake by Chrome and Windows, I swear, it's not a virus!

Chrome says:

Why the download was blocked The file download can be blocked for one of the following reasons: We believe that it is a malicious, unwanted, unusual or unsafe file. Malicious: You tried to download malware. Unwanted: You tried to download deceptive software. This program, disguised as a useful download, can make unexpected changes to your computer or device. Uncommon: You tried to download unknown and possibly dangerous software. Not secure: You tried to download a file or program that is not secure, but was started on a secure page. In some cases, you can choose to download it anyway. We found that the site from which you tried to download the file is known to distribute malware.

But this file has nothing to do with it

Have fun

Creator of this game (ME): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCK-UDJr9y55pAwRQELNDl5A?view_as=subscriber

 Who tested and verified (Lucca Aideira):  he don't have youtube channel
